Printing and Event Notification (cont.)

  • Event Report

    • Fully describes the event (what the event was, where it occurred, when it occurred, etc.)
    • Human Consumable
    • Machine Consumable
    • Mixed Format

  • Types of Notification (tied to delivery method?)

    • Immediate Notification
    • Queued Notification
